name: Makeup Creator
description:
FREE APP! Offers in Appa purchases

Customize your 3D model and take the role of the makeupartist. Participate in daily challenges and win reward coins. Purchase products and expand your personal makeup toolkit to make mor creative looks.

- Create your unique 3D model, customize with face features, skin tone and hair style.
- Create makeup styles based on makeup categories that includes: Foundation, Rouge, Sculpting, Eyeshadow, Eyeliner, Lips, Lipliner and Eyelashes.
- Create unlimited makeup styles.
- Participate in challenges and earn reward coins.
- Purchase from hundreds of makeup products and expand your makeup box.
- Get your styles featured in the Makeup Creator feed.
- Explore styles from other makeup artists and get inspired by other players.

ENJOY MAKEUP CREATION IN 3D!

Create Makeup styles on a whole new level in 3D for a more immersive experience. Choose from hundreds of different styles and create the looks of your dreams.

MAKE UNIQUE LOOKS AND PHOTOSHOOTS.

Choose from hundreds of different makeup assets and create your own looks.
